title: Client version is rejected by server???
body: So I'm playing a game and league just freezes and shuts down. I restart my computer and start up league again. It loads and I reach the login screen. I type in my user name and password and it says "Client version 6.19.16_09_15_21_03 is rejected by server." What does this mean??? What do I do??

replies.body:
This usually happens if there are missing or corrupt files in your League directory. A simple repatch can typically resolve this, so I recommend grabbing our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and running the *"Force a Repatch"* action.

Let me know if this resolves your problem.
